Sideward: I agree the voices aren't that good, *BUT* keep in mind considering the state of the anime industry today it could have been a lot worse of a fuck up.

They could have done that thing where the anime is barely animated and the characters look like machines moving or worse: cgi.

topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555a19d463687276c38c1400#post_555a19d463687276c38c1400
Shiori Experience. A 27 year old unassuming Japanese school teacher gets haunted by the ghost of Jimi Hendrix and now she has 365 days to become a musical legend or she is going to  DIE.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555a19d463687276c38c1400#post_555a19d463687276c38c1400
Its a Manga called Shiori Experience.

Its pretty good so far! The Manga is being translated by some guys so right now there are only 3 chapters.
